entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023
